title: Frank Lloyd Wright Light Screen Stained Glass Earrings, Blue/Green
description:
The Frank Thomas House, Oak Park, Illinois, (1901), is one of Frank Lloyd Wright’s Prairie School designs. In it, he created “light screens” or stained glass windows that integrated the design theme throughout the house. Those windows inspire these earrings.

Details:

  • Solid brass
  • Electro-plated with a hematite finish
  • Hand enameled
  • Glass beads
  • Posts are plated hematite
  • Hangs approx. 2.25"
